Master Answer:
Contact your West Vancouver health unit or doctor's office to make an appointment for your toddler to recieve the influenza vaccine (flu shot). Find your local health unit here. If it is your child's first time receiving a flu shot, your child will need a second dose 4 weeks later.
Immunization Nurse
